So I actually had added in a whole bunch of content, Cris for some reason could never see it yet I could.

Was there a bizarre glitch that happened that you know of.

Content below

Milkyway

A neutral palette redefined. Milkyway is a subtly textured neutral pale cream base interwoven with delicate black fibers.

The natural red and yellow undertones, subtly undulating throughout the material's surface, infuse a gentle, grounded warmth, balancing the cool neutrality and lending a touch of organic richness to this contemporary palette staple.

Milkyway is a testament to understated elegance, offering both visual and tactile appeal. This heathered effect creates a sense of both depth and airy spaciousness.

Think of the comforting, familiar texture of a favorite heathered jumper, its soft, blended yarns creating a visual and tactile harmony. Milkyway captures that same essence, translating the cozy, nuanced look of knitted textiles into a solid surtace. The delicate interplay of cream and black fibers mirrors the intricate weave of natural yarns, where subtle variations in color and texture create a rich, dimensional feel

Milkyway's versatile nature pairs seamlessly with Amethyst, Quartz and Umber, providing a sophisticated foundation for any interior. Experience the texture and tone - add these colors to your sample collection.

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead



T: +61 1800 626 462
Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com
